title: The Oathing Stone
description: Two life changing events. Riddles to be solved. Obstacles to be overcome. In the Scottish highlands, two strangers come together in order to find the answers, willing to leave behind the country they love and families for their individual quests. Lexi must discover why her father disappeared without a trace. Duncan must find the woman he vowed to protect even if the journey takes him to the other side of the world. But can they get past their mutual dislike and distrust and work together to solve both mysteries and right the wrongs that have derailed their lives?
author: Elizabeth M. Carola
